memberdef.name: k_ChannelTable
memberdef.initializer:
= { { eTextureFormat::R8, 1 }, { eTextureFormat::R16, 1 }, { eTextureFormat::R32, 1 },
{ eTextureFormat::RG8, 2 }, { eTextureFormat::RG16, 2 }, { eTextureFormat::RG32, 2 },
{ eTextureFormat::RGB8, 3 }, { eTextureFormat::RGB16, 3 }, { eTextureFormat::RGB32, 3 },
{ eTextureFormat::RGBA8, 4 }, { eTextureFormat::RGBA16, 4 }, { eTextureFormat::RGBA32, 4 },
{ eTextureFormat::SRGBA8, 4 } }

memberdef.name: k_BppTable
memberdef.initializer:
= { { eTextureFormat::R8, 1 }, { eTextureFormat::R16, 2 }, { eTextureFormat::R32, 4 },
{ eTextureFormat::RG8, 2 }, { eTextureFormat::RG16, 4 }, { eTextureFormat::RG32, 8 },
{ eTextureFormat::RGB8, 3 }, { eTextureFormat::RGB16, 6 }, { eTextureFormat::RGB32, 12 },
{ eTextureFormat::RGBA8, 4 }, { eTextureFormat::RGBA16, 8 }, { eTextureFormat::RGBA32, 16 },
{ eTextureFormat::SRGBA8, 4 }, }
